Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView

Class OtherStation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView.LocalStationPlayer
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView.OtherStation
public class OtherStation extends LocalStationPlayer
The class represents a station of another player, whose nickname is different from the client. The class extends LocalStationPlayer. It is created by the LocalModel class.

  • Field Details

    • backHandLock

      private final Object backHandLock
      Object uses as a lock for the changes in the backCardHand list.

    • backCardHand

      private List<Tuple<Symbol,PlayableCardType>> backCardHand
      The object represent another player hand. Because the client cannot have access to another player's hand, it can just show the back of the cards, so the Tuple of Symbol and PlayableCardType

    • cardIsPlaceable

      public boolean cardIsPlaceable(PlayableCard cardToPlace, PlayableCard anchor, Direction direction)
      To ask if a card is placeable given. For other stations it returns always false.
      Specified by:
      cardIsPlaceable in class LocalStationPlayer
      Parameters:
      cardToPlace - the card we want to place.
      anchor - the anchor card from which we want to place the card.
      direction - the direction in which we want to place the card.
      Returns:
      a boolean that is {code true} only if the card can be placed in that position.
